plan: What host and parasite factors control successful liver-stage infection and hypnozoite formation in P. vivax, and what does this imply for relapse-prevention strategies?
I want a strategy to find Plasmodium falciparum genes involved in gametocyte development. Help me plan the steps, identify candidate searches/parameters, and save a reusable plan artifact.
Help me plan a strategy that combines results across multiple RNA-seq studies (male + female gametocytes) and then maps to orthologs. Ask me only the minimum questions needed.
execute: Build a strategy to find genes from either Plasmodium falciparum 3D7 or Plasmodium falciparum Dd2.

Build a strategy to find orthologous genes upregulated in P. berghei gametocytes in either Otto et al 2014 or Yeoh et al 2017 (male + female samples). Map this combination to P. falciparum 3D7 orthologs, and keep only orthologs that are also upregulated in Lasonder et al 2016 male gametocytes.

plan: What molecular and environmental cues drive Toxoplasma gondii stage conversion (tachyzoite â†’ bradyzoite), and which parasite factors are most likely to mediate cyst persistence?

Build a strategy to find Cryptosporidium hominis genes with orthologs in Plasmodium falciparum but not in Toxoplasma gondii.
